name: Luprecal's Mark
description: Luprecal was a famous and noble daemon hunter in the northern Aqshi realm. It is said, that his power now lives in his ring.
effect: Your missile and area attacks has +1 chance on the Hit rolls against the __daemons__. You can discard this treasure to, in addition to the first effect, until end of turn deal double damage against __daemons__ enemies from any sources.
